subject: Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: It was obvious from the start, when Michelle Wie took aim at her first fairway of this L.P.G.A. Championship, that she was not the same golfer as last year.
snippet: It was obvious from the start, when Michelle Wie took aim at her first fairway of this L.P.G.A. Championship, that she was not the same golfer as last year.
